section.title: Course Description
section.p: Taken from the official PCC course description:

Introduces algebraic concepts and processes with a foucus on linear equations and inequalities in one and two variables. Emphasizes applications, graphs, formulas, and proper mathematical notation throughout the course. A scientific calculator may be required. The TI-30X II is recommended. Prerequisites: MTH 20 and (RD 80 or ESOL 250). Recommended that MTH 20 be taken within the past 4 terms. The PCC math department recommends that students take MTH courses in consecutive terms. Audit available.
The complete Course Content and Outcome Guide can be found at www.pcc.edu/ccog/.
